channel.title: [PI] Changing Client Login Box - No Sprite For Title Box! REP++
channel.description:
Hello There, I'm using the intdubpk client that came with the source and I successfully changed the Background (Not Difficult) But when I went to change the title box, I couldn't find a sprite for it anywhere in the cache? So I'm wondering if there is a different way this needs to be changed.
Help, REP++

item.title: [PI] Changing Client Login Box - No Sprite For Title Box! REP++
item.dc:creator: @Ecstacy_Pkz Ecstacy Pkz
item.description:
@Ecstacy_Pkz wrote:

I thought so too but I checked my entire client folder for keywords ‘title’ and ‘title’box’ and this is what I found…

private void loadTitleScreen() { if(normalLogin == true) titleBox = new Background(titleStreamLoader, "titlebox", 0); else titleBox1 = new Sprite("Login/Random/TITLEBOX"); titleButton = new Background(titleStreamLoader, "titlebutton", 0); aBackgroundArray1152s = new Background[12]; int j = 0; try {
But i’m not sure where it’s saying my titlebox is… Because my cache directory isn’t even like that.
It’s not Login>Random>TITLEBOX
It’s Sprites>Login>No Titlebox

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Changing Client Login Box - No Sprite For Title Box! REP++
